3.t: Would that you knew what the crash is!

4.t: On that day, people will be like scattered moths

5.t: and mountains will be like carded wool.

6.t: Those whose good deeds will weigh heavier (on the scale)

8.t: but those whose good deeds will be lighter (on the scale).

9.t: will have hawiyah as their dwelling.

10.t: Would that you knew what hawiya his?
